name: SWGA
tagline: Workflow to select primers for selective whole-genome amplification (SWGA)
body:
### Welcome to SWGA.
Selective whole-genome amplification (SWGA) is a way to specifically amplify a target genome over background sample DNA. For more information, see [Leichty & Brisson, _Genetics_, 2014](http://www.genetics.org/content/198/2/473.long).

### Quick start:

- [Install guide](https://github.com/eclarke/swga/wiki/Installation)
- [Getting started](https://github.com/eclarke/swga/wiki/)

### Support

Check out the wiki, mailing list, or contact me at @eclarke.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
